meanings.definition: Not awake or aware of one's surroundings.
meanings.sent1: The patient remained unconsciouses after the surgery.
meanings.sent2: She lay unconsciouses on the bed after fainting.
meanings.sent3: The cat seemed unconsciouses of the chaos it caused by knocking over the vase.
meanings.sent4: His mind was like an unconsciouses machine, functioning without his control.
meanings.sent5: The darkness of the room made her feel completely unconsciouses of where she was.

meanings.sent1: He acted unconsciously, reaching for his phone even in his sleep.
meanings.sent2: She walked unconsciously through the familiar path to her house.
meanings.sent3: The robot moved unconsciously, following its programmed instructions.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to pass unconsciously as he lost himself in the book.
meanings.sent5: Her fingers moved unconsciously over the piano keys, creating a beautiful melody.
